subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Rutgers Coach Greg Schiano named the true freshman Chas Dodd his starting quarterback for Saturday’s game against Army (4-2) at New Meadowlands Stadium.
snippet: Rutgers Coach Greg Schiano named the true freshman Chas Dodd his starting quarterback for Saturday’s game against Army (4-2) at New Meadowlands Stadium.
